import { Add, PlayArrow, ThumbDownAltOutlined, ThumbUpAltOutlined } from "@material-ui/icons" import { useState } from "react" import "./listItem.scss" export default function ListItem({index}) { const [isHoverd, setIsHoderd] = useState(false); const trailer = "https://player.vimeo.com/external/371433846.sd.mp4?s=236da2f3c0fd273d2c6d9a064f3ae35579b2bbdf&profile_id=139&oauth2_token_id=57447761"; return (
setIsHoderd(true)} onMouseLeave={()=> setIsHoderd(false)} style={{left: isHoverd && index*225 -50 + index*2.5}}> {isHoverd && ( <>
); }
